stanza.line: Accuse me thus that I have scanted (a)all(/a)
Wherein I should your great deserts (b)repay(/b)
Forgot upon your dearest love to (a)call(/a)
Whereto all bonds do tie me day by (b)day(/b)
That I have frequent been with unknown (c)minds(/c)
And given to time your own dear-purchased (d)right(/d)
That I have hoisted sail to all the (c)winds(/c)
Which should transport me farthest from your (d)sight(/d)
Book both my wilfulness and errors (e)down(/e)
Bring me within the level of your (e)frown(/e)
But shoot not at me in your wakened (f)hate(/f)
Since my appeal says I did strive to (g)prove(/g)
The constancy and virtue of your (g)love(/g)
